Messages.You win by matching symbols on win lines: You win by matching symbols on win lines. All symbols must be matched on consecutive reels from left to right. Only the highest win on each line will be paid. Malfunction voids all pays and plays. See game rules for more details.

Messages.A bomb symbol can appear on the central: A bomb symbol can appear on the central position on the reels, which will explode outwards in a random direction revealing either 3 scatters, Free Spin symbols, Bonus symbols or up to 5 wild symbols.

Messages.2 cherry bombs can appear in free spins: 2 cherry bomb symbols can appear in free spins revealing super wild or super scatter symbols.

Messages.Free Spin<br>Awards 9 free spin and 100:
Free Spin symbol
Awards 9 free spins and 100 coins

Messages.Can appear in the 3 central reels during: Can appear on the three middle reels during free spins. Substitutes for all non-special symbols.

Messages.1 to 9 symbols can appear in the 3 centr: 1 to 9 symbols can appear in the 3 central reels during free spins. Coins Payout:

Messages.The bonus symbol can appear in the 3 cen: The bonus symbol can appear in the 3 central reels. Choose from the 5 paths, the higher the number of the path the higher the risk, but the higher the potential winnings.

Messages.Select one from the 5 paths on the botto: Select a path by choosing a number from 1 to 5

Messages.the lower the number the lower is the ri: the lower the number the lower the risk

Messages.Special symbols can hide high prize or d: Purple units can hide high prizes or end the bonus round

Messages.Losing spins award a\nfree respin where\:
Bombs explode revealing
free spin symbols,
wilds, bonus or scatters.
